tool_description: API for AlDente Rewards app, for more information download AlDenteRewards app from Apple store or Google play
name: AlDenteAPI
title: AlDenteAPI

api_list.name: UpdateCard
api_list.description: POST to update an existing plastic card on RescardDB
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aldenteapi.p.rapidapi.com/card/update"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aldenteapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Add Virtual Card
api_list.description: API request a new Virtual card to client  parsing customerID , and user Biometrics using a POST method
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aldenteapi.p.rapidapi.com/card/vcard"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aldenteapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
